import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import listProductDetails from '../redux/actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) useEffect(() => { dispatch() // const fetchProduct = async () => { // const res = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) // setproduct(res.data) // } // fetchProduct() }, [match]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
